title: travelplanner: I need to plan a 7-day solo trip starting in Los Angeles and including visits to 3 different cities in Florida, from March 22nd to March 28th, 2022. The budget for this trip should not exceed $4,700. (989556f603b3cbf6)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

chat_history.content:
Here is your 7-day trip itinerary:

## Day 1: Wednesday 23 March
- **Flight:** Flight F3512238 from Los Angeles, CA to Orlando, FL, departing at 15:26 and arriving at 22:58. The total journey time will be 4 hours and 32 minutes, and the cost of the flight is $468.
- **Accommodation:** You could stay at the Private furnished bedroom in Williamsburg for $179 per night. This accommodation has a minimum stay of 5 nights. Please note that this accommodation does not allow children under 10 years old, parties, pets, or smoking.
- **Attractions:** On the first day, you could visit SeaWorld Orlando, the Wheel at ICON Park, or Fun Spot America Theme Parks.
- **Food:** Some restaurant options in Orlando include Fuji Japanese Steakhouse, Turquoise Villa, and The Tandoori Times.

## Day 2: Thursday 24 March
- **Accommodation:** See above.
- **Attractions:** Explore Madame Tussauds Orlando, Ripley's Believe It or Not!, and Universal Orlando Resort.
- **Food:** Some restaurant recommendations are Indochi Cafe & Restaurant, Bite N Sip, and Pure Bliss.

## Day 3: Friday 25 March
- **Flight:** Flight F3666068 from Orlando, FL to Miami, FL, departing at 15:16 and arriving at 22:43. The total journey time will be 4 hours and 27 minutes, and the cost of the flight is $983.
- **Accommodation:** You could stay at the Cozy Two-bedroom Apt in a Cute House in Brooklyn! for $99 per night.
- **Attractions:** Discover Jungle Island, Pérez Art Museum Miami, and Bayfront Park.
- **Food:** Some restaurant recommendations in Miami are Clocked, Shorts Burger and Shine, and Papouli's Mediterranean Cafe & Market.

## Day 4: Saturday 26 March
- **Accommodation:** See above.
- **Attractions:** Visit Wynwood Walls, Maurice A. Ferré Park, and Miami Seaquarium.
- **Food:** Some restaurant options include Tako Cheena by Pom Pom, AB's Absolute Barbecues, and Anjlika.

## Day 5: Sunday 27 March
- **Accommodation:** See above.
- **Attractions:** Check out Bayside Marketplace, Skyviews Miami Observation Wheel, and Phillip & Patricia Frost Museum of Science.
- **Food:** Some restaurant recommendations are Spice It - Hotel IBIS, Spices & Sauces, and L'Opera.

## Day 6: Monday 28 March
- **Flight:** I could not find a return flight to Los Angeles on this date. Unfortunately, I am not able to find alternative flights at this time.
- **Accommodation:** See above.
- **Attractions:** Explore Miami Children's Museum, Vizcaya Museum & Gardens, and Miami Walk of Fame.
- **Food:** Some restaurant options include The Diet Kitchen, AB's - Absolute Barbecues, and Cafe 17.

## Day 7: Tuesday 29 March
- **Flight:** See above.
- **Accommodation:** See above.
- **Attractions:** Visit Lummus Park, Torch of Friendship, and Official Art Deco Walking Tour.
- **Food:** Some restaurant recommendations are South Indian Corner, Friends Fast Food, and BarShala.

Unfortunately, I was unable to find any attractions or restaurants in Coral Springs, and I could not find a flight back to Los Angeles from Miami on the last day of your trip.

The total estimated cost of this trip is $3,714 for accommodation, flights, and attractions. You can use the remaining $986 of your budget for food and any additional activities or travel between cities.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
